item.title: Enable Disable Invoices
item.description: Preconditions Having a shop installed locally Go to the BO and connect with an admin account Steps Step Description Expected result Go to “Orders > Invoices” page Invoices page is displayed successfully Disable invoices and save the form The invoice is disabled successfully The validation message is displayed successfully “Update successful” Go to “Orders > Orders” page Orders page is displayed successfully Open the fourth-order page Order page is displayed successfully Change the order status to “Shipped” The status is changed successfully

item.title: Enable Disable Tax Breakdown
item.description: Preconditions Having a shop installed locally Go to the BO and connect with an admin account Steps Step Description Expected result Go to “Orders > Invoices” page Invoices page is displayed successfully Enable tax breakdown and save the form The tax breakdown is enabled successfully The validation message is displayed successfully “Update successful” Go to “International > taxes” page Taxes page is displayed successfully Go to “Tax rules” page The tax rules page is displayed successfully Create new tax rule group

item.title: Enable Disable Product Image
item.description: Preconditions Having a shop installed locally Go to the BO and connect with an admin account Steps Step Description Expected result Go to “Orders > Invoices” page Invoices page is displayed successfully Enable product image and save the form The product image is enabled successfully The validation message is displayed successfully “Update successful” Open the FO page The home page is opened successfully Add the first product to the cart There is one product in the cart Click on “Proceed to checkout” button The purchase form is displayed correctly Sign in with the default account “pub@prestashop.
